text: Markandeya Avvari is one of the Indian surnames (Family names) which comes under Brahmin caste or Padmashali Caste and Padmashali sub-caste. Gothram of Avvari family can be ""Bharadwajasa"" or "Sri Mahadeva Maharushi". Avvari families are predominantly residing in the Indian states of Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu. ==References== * http://www.markandeya.in/markandeya-aboutmarkandeya-padmashali.php ==External links== * https://web.archive.org/web/20150524020453/http://padmashalinetwork.com/ * http://www.worldpadmashali.net/surnameGothramsList.php?
